statements: SELECT user_id, username, login_time, login_status FROM user_authentication_logs;
SELECT username, user_id, login_status, login_time FROM user_authentication_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_logs;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE login_status = true;
SELECT username, login_time FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND login_status = TRUE ORDER BY login_time DESC
SELECT username, login_time FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE login_status = FALSE ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, username, login_status FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE login_status = TRUE AND username LIKE 'admin%'
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE username != 'guest'
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_logs WHERE login_status = TRUE LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM authentication_attempts
SELECT user_id, timestamp, authentication_result FROM authentication_attempts WHERE authentication_result = TRUE
SELECT user_id, timestamp, failure_reason FROM biometric_failure_logs
SELECT user_id, timestamp, authentication_result FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, failure_reason FROM biometric_failure_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM biometric_failure_logs WHERE failure_reason LIKE '%fingerprint%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM authentication_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_attempts > 3 ORDER BY total_attempts DESC;
SELECT user_id, MIN(timestamp) AS first_attempt, MAX(timestamp) AS last_attempt FROM authentication_attempts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, username, success FROM authentication_attempts
SELECT * FROM biometric_verification ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM failure_logs WHERE error_message LIKE '%failed%'
SELECT username, timestamp FROM authentication_attempts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = false
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, username, success FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 101
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM failure_logs WHERE error_message LIKE '%Invalid%'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM failure_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT username, timestamp FROM biometric_verification WHERE verified = true
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM biometric_verification ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = false ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, reason FROM authentication_failures WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, success FROM authentication_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, reason FROM authentication_failures WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM biometric_verification WHERE matched = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, authentication_result FROM user_authentication_attempts WHERE authentication_result = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, verification_result FROM biometric_verification_logs WHERE verification_result = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, authentication_result FROM user_authentication_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_failures WHERE failure_reason = 'Invalid Password' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.user_id) AS login_attempts FROM user_accounts u JOIN user_authentication_attempts ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING login_attempts > 5 ORDER BY login_attempts DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role FROM user_accounts u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, verification_result FROM biometric_verification_logs WHERE verification_result = TRUE;
